Cultist Acolytes

Each cult has distinct Acolyte variants with different statistics and abilities.
Monsters.Acolyte of the Eidolon:
Acolyte of the Eidolon

Vassal | Medium Mortal

StatValue
Armor16
HP17 (4)
Move30 ft
VariantTK
Horrific Rating—
Invasion Level0
Inert Spectral Energy1d4
Physical Checks+3
Magical Checks+3
Primary Attack: Ritual Athame +1, 5ft, 4 (1d4+1) Physical Secondary Attack: Blackened Glaive +1, 10ft, 6 (1d10+1) Magical

Traits: Innate: Levitate, Magical Leap, Self-Preservation

Abilities:

  • Self-Preservation: Flees when at ¼ HP
  • One Who Sees (Eidolon): While Eidolon Outsider present, remove Self-Preservation, +2 damage, +1 Checks
  • Waning Twilight: Full-Round Action: Choose a target within 10 feet. They must Roll to Resist (Purity; DC 12 + X) where X is the target's current Trauma Points. On failure: gain Distressed and Prone Conditions, plus 1 Trauma Point. After being subjected, target is immune to Waning Twilight until next Sleep Phase. Squadron can only be subjected to one Waning Twilight per Encounter
  • Repel Magic: Spell Attacks always miss this target if the die roll is 8 or below

Adversary | Medium Mortal

Custodians are the highest-ranking Cultists. Each cult has its own Custodian variant with unique abilities.
Monsters.Custodian of the Eidolon:
Custodian of the Eidolon

StatValue
Armor15
HP65 (16)
Move30 ft
VariantVN
Horrific Rating—
Invasion Level2
Inert Spectral Energy2d4
Physical Checks+4
Magical Checks+5
Primary Attack: Ornate Athame +9, 5ft, 13 (3d6+3) Physical Secondary Attack: Reflection Beam +12, 5ft, 17 (3d8+4) Physical
  • As Reaction to being targeted by spell (before dice rolled): Opposed Mysticism Check. Custodian wins = MP refunded, caster takes Reflection Beam damage

    • Traits: Innate: Levitate, Magical Leap

    Abilities:

  • One Who Speaks (Eidolon): While in battle, all Eidolon Cultists remove Self-Preservation
  • Sense Weakness: Primary Attack strikes twice if target is missing any HP
  • Triad Curator (Eidolon): Advantage vs Disoriented/Silenced. While Eidolon Outsider within 60ft: +4 (1d8) damage, +2 Checks
  • Speaker for Elsewhere (Eidolon): Full-Round, Mysticism DC 15: Become Unconscious, removed. Spawn IL 1 Eidolon Outsider (e.g., Crystalline Horror) in location
  • Custodial Guidance (Eidolon): Free Action 1/Turn: Any Eidolon Cultist (IL 1-) within 30ft immediately makes Primary Attack
  • Dispel Magic: Spell Attacks auto-miss on die roll 10 or lower

Monsters.Ravenous Jelly:
Ravenous Jelly

Vassal | Large Outsider

StatValue
Armor8
HP46
Move20 ft
VariantHV
Horrific Rating—
Invasion Level1
Spectral Energy1d8
CultAny
Physical Checks+6
Magical Checks+3
Primary: Flailing Appendage +5, 15ft, 8 (1d8+4) Physical Secondary: Expel Effluvium +5, 30ft, 8 (1d8+4) Magical

Traits: Attune Victim, Darksight, Ferocious, Native to Elsewhere, Resilient (Physical Resistance), Stalker

Abilities:

  1. Amorphous: As Move, fit through any surface (not with living Enveloped Creature). Immune to Disoriented/Restrained. Can never Provoke
  2. Envelope: At end of Move in creature's space: Roll to Resist (DEX DC 17) or Restrained + Enveloped. Moves with Jelly
  3. Suffocating Embrace: Start of Enveloped creature's turn: Roll to Resist (CON DC 17) or permanent Disoriented/Paralyzed/Silenced + 22 (5d4+10) Magical. If already has Conditions: auto-damage + Soul-Siphoned +1. Expelled on Jelly defeat (Conditions removed except Soul-Siphoned). After Weapon damage: attacker picks target, d100 51+ = expelled
Jelly Variants (roll d4):
d4TypeAdditional Ability
1ScorchingScorching Goo: Reaction to damage, 10ft Roll to Resist (CON DC 14) or Burning (3). Expel = Burning (3). Appendage = Prone
2CorrosiveCorrosive Goo: Reaction to damage, 10ft Roll to Resist (DEX DC 14) or Burning (2). Expel = Burning (2) or Distressed. Appendage = Prone
3FrostedFrosted Goo: Reaction to damage, 10ft Roll to Resist (STR DC 14) or Restrained. Expel = Paralyzed. Appendage = pushed 5ft + Envelope
4RoyalIllustrious: Armor 10, HP 84, Attack +7, damage 16. IL 2. Magical damage, Shroud instead of Resilient. Royal Goo: Reaction to Physical damage, Roll to Resist (Magic DC 15) or Restrained/Silenced + heal 7 HP. Expel = Poisoned. Appendage = Drained

Creating Creatures of the Invading Evil

The tables below are a streamlined version of the formulas used to calculate Outsider statistics.
Monsters.World-Ender Characteristics:
World-Ender Characteristics

StatTypical Range
Armor20+
HP500+
Attack+18+
Damage70+
Checks+10+
Horrific Rating95+
Invasion Level7+
Spectral Energy8d8+
Common Traits:
  • Multiple Actions per turn
  • Legendary Resistances (auto-succeed failed saves, limited uses)
  • Lair Actions affecting entire battlefield
  • Immunity to most Conditions
  • Multiple phases or forms
  • Can only be permanently defeated through specific means (rituals, artifacts, etc.)
Note: Specific World-Ender stat blocks are campaign-specific and created by the Magic Keeper based on story requirements.
